attributes.action: Scrap the  newly announced London 2012 logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new logo has been announced for the London 2012 Olympics. 
http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/other_sports/olympics_2012/6718243.stm

I feel it is an embarrassment, an irrelevance and portrays the creative skills of our nation in a poor light.

This petition calls for a return to the old logo, and a refund of any monies spent on creating the new one

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
